casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Michael Patrick RYAN 366A10-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 13, 2019 Marilyn G. Ozer, Attorney at Law, William F. Massengale, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for Ryan, Michael Patrick. Kelvin Atkinson, Assistant District Attorney, Joan M. Cunningham, Assistant Attorney General, Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Locke Bell, Attorney at Law, Mary Carla Babb, Assistant Attorney General, Locke Bell, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

William Stevenson, Assistant District Attorney.

Dear Ms. Ozer:

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 13th of February 2019 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of February 2019."
